fifo_buffer_t Struct Reference

#include <serialserver.h>


Data Fields

packet_entry_t * top
packet_entry_t * bottom
packet_entry_t * fifo_ring

Detailed Description

This struct defines the actual FIFO buffer.

Field Documentation

struct packet_entry_t* fifo_buffer_t::bottom
 

This pointer points at all times to the bottom of the stack (=FIFO) i.e. it's the first item to be purged from the stack.

struct packet_entry_t* fifo_buffer_t::fifo_ring
 

The actual buffer. The size of the buffer is set at initialization. Variable nRdconf.serialbufsize is used as the size.

struct packet_entry_t* fifo_buffer_t::top
 

This pointer points at all times to the top of the stack (=FIFO) i.e. it's the last item that has been added to the stack.
